name: LOCI
paper: Loci: Fast outlier detection using the local correlation integral. ICDE
description: LOCI computes an outlier score using the Local Correlation Integral, enabling automatic, data-driven cut-offs rather than arbitrary parameter choices. Additionally, it produces a rich LOCI plot for each point—revealing local structure, cluster densities, and diameters—which surpasses other methods that yield only a single outlierness score.
